text: la ahd 'ashadu zlmana mmman taqawwal alkadhib ealaa allah teala, fzem 'ana lah shuraka' fi alebadt, 'aw addaea 'ana lah wldana 'aw sahbt, 'aw kadhab bbrahynh wadlth alty ayad biha rusulah ealayhim alsalam. 'iinah la yuflih alzaalimun aladhin aftru alkadhib ealaa allh, wala yzfrwn bmtalbhm fi aldunya wala fi alakhrt
